title: SpicyMintAvocadoMargarita
recipe: Rim a double rocks glass with salt and set aside.
Add the avocado, jalapeno, mint and lime juice into a mixing glass and muddle until the avocado is mashed.
Add the tequila, liqueur, syrup and salt.
Fill the glass with ice, and shake until well-chilled.
Strain into the prepared glass over fresh ice.
